title: Going To The Chapel! Farrah Abraham’s Mom Drops Shocking Wedding News
text:
The next Teen Mom star to walk down the aisle will be Farrah Abraham ‘s mom! Debra Danielsen exclusively revealed to RadarOnline.com all the details of her upcoming wedding and if her daughter will attend despite their rocky relationship.
“We are trying to plan a destination wedding,” Debra, who got engaged to Dr. David Merz in October 2016, told Radar. “We’re thinking of Bora Bora and being married on the beach.”
But will her daughter be in attendance? Farrah will appear on the upcoming season of Marriage Boot Camp Reality Stars: Family Edition with her mother and father Michael Abraham .
PHOTOS: Farrah Abraham Celebrates 25th Birthday With ‘Teen Mom’ Pal Jenelle Evans 
Debra recently told Radar of the stint, “It was an opportunity that was too good to pass on. To be able to look at the difficulties we had and to do it in an intense way was really important .”
Despite their family feud, Debra insists her daughter will be there on her big day.
“My Farrah is going be front and center,” Debra said, adding of her granddaughter , “Sophia too!”
PHOTOS: Farrah Abraham’s Sex Tape ‘Lies’ Exposed At Last! 
But Debra isn’t the only one Farrah has issues with, as she fought with her future stepfather on the most recent season of Teen Mom OG because of the way she treats her mother.
David told Farrah of Debra, “She’s under stress, she’s under a lot of things, she’s been through a bunch of s**t and she gets all this stuff thrown at her. I’ve watched Teen Mom. It hurts me because I know her. Why are they doing that to her? Beating her up .”
When Farrah says she can’t control the negativity from the show, he fired back, “ You’re the one who says it! ”
